name: YoYa: Dress Up Princess
summary:
Every girl is born a fashion designer. YoYa: Dress Up Princess arouses in them the talent for creating beauty to magnify their charm.
There are tons of fashion clothes for your to match at will. Be it hairstyle or makeup, clothes or accessories, you can create a special dress room, where you can easily manage princess, models, and elite fashion female.
YoYa series deliver a new costume game experience and richer gameplay to girls, with more varied gorgeous visual feast to constantly amaze players with more surprises.

The iOS version was released in March 2023, but was shortly thereafter delisted without any updates.
